snippet: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission is becoming a thorn in the side of big banks, The Royal Bank of Scotland said it expected to face penalties related to the Libor investigation, and JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup are in the top "bucket" of...
abstract: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission is becoming a thorn in the side of big banks, The Royal Bank of Scotland said it expected to face penalties related to the Libor investigation, and JPMorgan Chase and Citigroup are in the top "bucket" of institutions that are considered "systemically important."
